messageBody:
I think this is great information that it should be added as part of the FAQ list. Talking about the list, what is the final deal?

>
> Caught error java.lang.InternalError: Can't connect to X11 window server using 'foo.bar.com:0.0' as the value of the DISPLAY variable.

I haven't been working on X Windows for quite a few years but I vaguely remember a 'xhost' command to allow a remote host connection for display to solve
this problem. Is that right?

Shane
